name: KENDAMVR - Virtual Reality Kendama
description: KENDAMVR Is the world's first virtual reality Kendama game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
